title: Hour 2: Madden Madness
description:
Robert Williams III and Bart Scott return in this episode to debate if a (much wealthier) Kyler Murray can lead the Cardinals to a Super Bowl this season after agreeing to a massive contract extension with Arizona. Rece Davis joins the show to help count us down to college football season with his take on the possibility of Georgia repeating as national champions and what team he believes could be a dark horse to make the playoffs. On the final day of Madden ratings reveal week, Kimberly A. Martin is back to debate who is the better QB right now: Brady or Rodgers? Also, the crew decides if it's a big deal for Bill Belichick and the Patriots to go without an offensive coordinator this season. Bart predicted the future last year with the Rams Super Bowl title, will he do it again with his pick to win the NFC?
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Stephen A. Smith, Molly Qerim Rose
itunes:subtitle: First Take Hour 2: Who is the better QB right now: Brady or Rodgers?
